docs.snippet: Yu Darvish of the Rangers, a friend and rival of the injured Masahiro Tanaka, said he believed that six-man rotations could relieve the stress on pitchers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yu Darvish of the Rangers, a friend and rival of the injured Masahiro Tanaka, said he believed that six-man rotations could relieve the stress on pitchers.
docs.abstract: Texas Rangers pitcher Yu Darvish says shift to a six-man rotation by major league teams could significantly reduce injuries by giving pitchers a critical extra day of rest and limiting their starts; comments come amid epidemic of elbow injuries among major league pitchers, including Darvish's longtime friend Masahiro Tanaka of the New York Yankees.

headline.seo: Rangers' Yu Darvish Pushes for a Six-Man Pitching Rotation
